issue.title: [Java] Support subfield encoder use different hasher
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7259](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7259). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently `ListSubFieldEncoder/StructSubFieldEncoder` use default hasher for calculating hashCode.

This issue enables them to use different hasher or even user-defined hasher for their own use cases just like `DictionaryEncoder` does.
